resources.string: Ghost Ship Games was founded in the spring of 2016 by 6 veteran game developers. By now, we have grown to a team of 32 people, comprised of both industry veterans and up and coming developers.

Right from the get-go, weâ€™ve had a couple of over-arching goals: Making games that we would enjoy playing ourselves, making games that take co-op to the next level, and to avoid many of the game development pitfalls we have encountered elsewhere.
